body.p: Lyon County, Kentucky, farmer. South Carolina native. Married to Nancy Stone. Father of Sarah J. Stone, Rebecca F. Stone, and William J. Stone. Farmer in Lyon County in 1850 and 1860. Owned thirteen enslaved persons in 1860.
